p.b: In this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter you'll find news about Gentoo Linux's presence at LinuxWorld Expo and the imminent release of Gentoo Linux 1.4, not to mention the new Gentoo Linux store and open positions in the Gentoo Linux project. We also introduce a community documentation site devoted to Gentoo in production environments, and a hosting company now offering Gentoo Linux to its clients. Enjoy!
